column1: House Democrats promised they would work with @HouseGOP members on another COVID-19 relief bill with or without Pelosi. Well the time has come to make good on that promise because American workers are struggling. @GOPLeader https://t.co/oE5QY5QSVY

Thanks to American ingenuity and @POTUS's Operation Warp Speed we are breaking all records for having an available coronavirus vaccine. This is great news! America can’t afford another lockdown. https://t.co/HAoF1G1yAU

Even the media and members of her own party agree: Nancy Pelosi has failed the American people by refusing to work with the White House on COVID relief. The House needs fresh leadership that will do its job and provide help for our workers and families. https://t.co/nC1co9wN3A

CHINA While China was originating spreading & hiding key information on #Covid19 #KamalaHarris was busy impeaching @realDonaldTrump.   #Biden spent 47 yers kow-towing to China.  #PresidentTrump challenged China forcing them to stop stealing American jobs patents & technology.

Despite the odds our recovery continues and unemployment falls once again. If Nancy Pelosi and the Democrats would come to the table on serious COVID-19 relief talks it would be dropping much faster. https://t.co/OoVI3FZwWs

Senate Dems just BLOCKED funding for schools COVID-19 tests vaccine research and assistance for American families and workers. This is partisan politics at its worse and a transparent attempt to hold America hostage before an election. https://t.co/bbxsJw8oB9

Republicans are working to get workers and businesses the relief they need but Dems are blocking those efforts. Remember: Pelosi called Congress back for hearings and votes on USPS but she can't work with Republicans to get COVID relief passed. https://t.co/qlUS4gNfyE

FACTS: Post Office Conspiracy Theory  #Pelosi ignoring help 4 small biz workers & families struggling to survive Covid-19...but peddling fear & misinformation about #USPS.  USPS says can easily handle mail-in ballots. Solvent thru fall 2021.  Has $14b cash + $10b CARES $$.

First China's Communist Party covered up and spread lies about COVID-19 and now they are hiring hackers to steal information about vaccines in development. This kind of hostile behavior can't be ignored glad the DOJ is bringing indictments. https://t.co/cQ1axxMx5f

At a time when Congress should be delivering solutions to the Coronavirus pandemic Pelosi & Dems are forcing through a cynical & dangerous agenda of providing taxpayer-funded housing to illegals expanding Obamacare & forcing through the Green New Deal. https://t.co/KtYeb7dghZ

Encouraging news as President @realDonaldTrump @HouseGOP and I have been working to reverse the adverse effect coronavirus has had on our economy. We will recover and come out stronger than ever! https://t.co/NfPSc933sn

I joined the Sam Malone Show to discuss the right to peacefully protest how Texas is recovering from COVID-19 and new legislation I introduced to ensure rural communities get the federal funding they need. Listen: https://t.co/sMXMEMVwvT

I joined Maria Bartiromo this morning to discuss how we will recover post-coronavirus. We have to get folks back to work and relieve the tax burden of our small businesses if we want to bring the strongest economy in the world roaring back. Watch here: https://t.co/ZeIX1ArHba

NO KIDDING Judge in same county that released hundreds of hardened criminals jails a woman for fighting to put food on her table & save her small business.   She's in same jail that has 248 inmates w/COVID-19.   Seriously?   https://t.co/i5u2DfOBhJ

Check out my interview yesterday on Press Pool with Julie Mason. Give it a listen to hear how our 8th District is doing how the reopening of Texas is going and the plans President Trump & I are working on to continue fighting the Coronavirus. Listen: https://t.co/bZB7351C0i

I joined @BreitbartNews Sunday to talk about the government's response to COVID-19 and the aid we're providing to states. As @GovAbbott looks to reopen our economy later this week it remains important to balance health guidelines with the need to get folks back to work. LISTEN: https://t.co/kFcWWae3gn
I joined America's Newsroom to discuss the Phase 3.5 Coronavirus relief package and why Congress needs to focus on helping businesses and states reopen safely. Watch now: https://t.co/t60zxnitzh

Nancy Pelosi and the left have been dishonestly attacking President Trump's response to the coronavirus for weeks. My friend and colleague Congressman @DanCrenshawTX recently set the record straight. Watch: https://t.co/R3iEkPn5d3

PROUD TO SERVE... ...On @realDonaldTrump Task Force on Reopening Economy  #POTUS is right: Let’s continue applying max pressure on #COVID19 while reopening our economy safely & responsibly. We can & must - to prevent hurting working families & jobless with extended recesssion. https://t.co/wPF7bsyuaa

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram is a vital lifeline for Texas' small businesses & workers impacted by #COVID19. Pelosi needs to do the right thing & act on @realDonaldTrump's request for additional funds for the program. I'm going to keep working hard to make sure it happens. https://t.co/Psq33DQGii
Important reminder: Tax Day has been moved to July 15th in order to help taxpayers during the COVID-19 pandemic. More information is available at https://t.co/LTuJaHsNmX. https://t.co/uhHqhszZZy

The coronavirus has hit us hard but our economy will rebound. The key to our recovery is keeping our small businesses alive & helping those whose hours are cut & whose days at work are reduced. The #PaycheckProtectionProgram will help do just that. https://t.co/70nLRCIxe1

No one could have imagined how hard the Coronavirus would hit our country. I'm proud of my colleagues in Congress for uniting in this time of need and passing a critical relief bill for the American people and I'm thankful to @POTUS for immediately signing it into law. https://t.co/Q3aekUHQuh

.@realDonaldTrump is working closely with members of Congress & Governors across the political spectrum to protect Americans from the threat of the #coronavirus. It is shameful that members of the media are spreading misinformation during this outbreak. https://t.co/GnykwhM1hA

The CDC has awarded Texas a $35.2 million grant to support our COVID-19 response. This grant is essential to helping our local health entities combat this virus and I applaud @realDonaldTrump for his commitment to protect the health and welfare of Texans. https://t.co/ino37O4HYH

Last Friday I helped lead the effort to pass the Families First Coronavirus Response Act which funds increased testing & economic protections for the sick. As we deal with this crisis we are fortunate to have great leaders in President Trump VP Pence and Sec. Mnuchin. https://t.co/Ux7BNbedkF

As we monitor and work to reduce the spread of coronavirus it's up to all of us to practice an abundance of caution. Please review the following guidelines from the White House and stay healthy my friends! https://t.co/sdiY2ebNNe

Thank you to Chris Salcedo for having me on his show to discuss the government's response to #Coronavirus the U.S. economy and trade with China. Give it a listen at the link below: https://t.co/zAlgYynX9j

This is disgraceful even for Pelosi! Dems are holding bill to deal with the Wuhan Virus hostage unless they get permanent new funds free from Hyde Amendment protections. This will mean direct govt. funding of abortions. Extremists sinking to new low. https://t.co/9JiR2Zx1zp

This morning I joined Chris Salcedo to talk about the government's coronavirus response. The U.S. remains one of the most prepared countries in the world and I am working diligently with the President to ensure our testing capabilities are maximized. LISTEN: https://t.co/OiqhTQDZbU
